page.title: 07VILLAGE CHILD'S SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I go to Rodmarton School. We start school at 9.15 and finish at 3.05 with 45 minutes for lunch. On Thursdays the violin teacher comes. These are the other teachers. Full time the Head teacher who also teaches the juniors and the infant class teacher. Part time one teacher for a day, a teacher for remedial work, half a day and a teacher for the deaf, an hour a week. Also a cook,a cleaner and a clerical assistant. There are 30 children. In the mornings we do maths, science, writing and reading. In the afternoons we do P.E., play games like netball, football and unihoc, paint, draw, use the computer and learn geography and history. Sometimes we visit other schools or go on outings to places of interests like the Severn Valley Railway.
